data.name: Art of Stunt
data.detailed_description:
Art of Stunt is a third-person physics sandbox destruction game in which you control a stuntman as he completes thrilling stunts in a variety of scenes. The rules of the game are simple, just follow the on-screen prompts to make various parkour, fall, turn, brake or jump movements and reach the target area. By destroying various obstacles and vehicles you can get additional equipment from motorcycles to jeeps and high performance sports cars.



Game Features:

1. Ten maps.
2. You can show exaggerated operation, experience the thrill of thrill.
3. You can drive motorcycles, sports cars and other vehicles to complete the stunt action.
4. You can complete some classic action stunts, including falling from the roof of a skyscraper, leaping over a valley on a motorcycle, driving through the glass wall of a building, etc.
5. Customized skin system.

data.short_description: Become the king of stunts! Show off your stunt skills in a variety of movie scenes like a Hollywood action movie star!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560(1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.6+
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 GTX / AMD Radeon 7850 HD series card
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Includes some explosions and fight scenes
